entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • End of year 2024 repo health check #110456
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_GetCounters Failed #110454
  • System.Text.Json.JsonException thrown when deserializing asynchronously to nullable types #110450
  • ParameterInfo.ToString() is inconsistent with the .NET Framework behavior #110447
  • Uppercase #110446
  • Wasm test failure on HttpRequest_BodylessMethod_LargeContentLength #110445
  • Incorrect nullability declaration with return value of LocalCertificateSelectionCallback delegate #110444
  • .NET 9: Zeroconf discovery is broken #110443
  • ASPNet service crashing on linux-arm64 when targeted to net9.0 #110442
    10.0.0
  • Error: System.ArgumentException: Identifier is not CLS-compliant. (Parameter 'ident') #110435
  • [API Proposal]: Provide means to construct a CoseSign1Message with private key in Azure Key Vault #110431
  • [API Proposal]: Consider Equals method(s) on DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler to avoid temporary string allocations #110427

Closed

  • [mono] Test failed on windows: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.Tests.SortRequestControlTests #34679
    Future
  • dotnet: /lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.34' not found (required by dotnet) (Installing on Raspberry pi 3) #109993
  • `ObjectFactory<T>` delegate should be covariant #101829
    10.0.0
  • Inlining perf regression .net8 to .net9 #110453
  • Cannot step into a Tail Call #110441
    8.0.x
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder, types throw exceptions even after created #108733
    10.0.0
  • JsonSerializer uses different default values for properties between reading and writing, causing data loss in round-trips #110423
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement - Invalid URI after upgrade to 9.0 #110400
  • LdapConnection throws `LdapException: The feature is not supported` when using Negotiate or Kerberos authentication #109449
    10.0.0
  • Specific double to decimal conversion has unexpected result #110439
  • Loading assemblies from root folder `/` fails on linux arm64 (error code 0x80070002) #109593
  • System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.TestZeroTimeout hangs in CI #31719
    Future
  • failed to build when make #110429
  • How to use a custom source generator to inform the source generator of System.Text.Json to generate code for the corresponding class #110428
    Future
  • LINQ All returns True if the size of the collection is 0. #110433
  • AF Thread::IsObjRefValid(&objref) in RuntimeMethodHandle_InvokeMethod #110394
  • Cross build on windows 11 arm64 #110424
  • Nullable JsonDocument property will deserialized to JsonValueKind.Null instead of null #110231

PullRequests

Created

  • Update area-owners with up-to-date information about community triagers. #110460
    area-Meta
  • Fix `IDE0251: Make member readonly` #110459
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Remove DiagnosticSource reference from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #110458
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging
  • fix wrong arguments order in CrlCacheExpired call #110457
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Allow stack size to be configured for native AOT #110455
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `fgFirstColdBlock` checks in frontend phases #110452
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't run `fgComputeBlockWeights` in MinOpts #110451
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Handle no method def token when trying to get the IL version state #110449
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Re-enable bundle archive building in source build #110448
    blocked, blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110440
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110438
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Remove some RuntimeExport/RuntimeImport indirections #110437
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for "ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: _Uaarch64_setcontext" when doing build for FreeBSD-arm64 using internal libunwind #110432
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update helix images #110384
    area-Infrastructure
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Make `ObjectFactory<T>` covariant #102553
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Install zlib in the IlcFrameworkNative folder instead of alongside the runtime #110378
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [debugger] Support step into a tail call #110334
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder missing methods on generated types #109320
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Handle not truncating root folder in `CorUnix::InternalCanonicalizeRealPath` for all architectures instead of only amd64 #110425
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110377
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix zlib-ng build with cmake 3.31.0 #110359
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Only build cdac-build-tool when we need to build runtime #109719
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix conversion of `void*` to `OBJECTREF` #110426
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] Handle type descs in `RuntimeTypeSystem_1.GetLoaderModule` #110325
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

Updated

  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan (Try 2) #109707
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI test: Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    NO-REVIEW, area-HostModel
  • [8.0] Guard against empty Accept address #108334
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't do opportunistic ISA lightup if there are plans to run the AltJit code #110419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • Propose new async API #110420
    area-Meta
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Lazily-initialize RegexCompiler's cached reflection members #109283
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Enable AltJits build for LoongArch64 and RiscV64 #110282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Update System.Speech to also recognize Speech_OneCore #110123
    area-System.Speech
  • Tweak `EncodeToUtf16_Vector128` #110203
    community-contribution, needs-author-action, needs-area-label
  • Change assertion in IPGlobalProperties_DomainName_ReturnsEmptyStringWhenNotSet #110070
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #110393
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix return address hijacking with CET #109548
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #110163
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
